about_the_game:
WELCOME TO PROLOGUE OF NONE SHALL INTRUDE!In this free version, you are able to conquer the first Act of Herelon. Will you be able to defeat the Dragon Slayer and secure the first part of the map?

None Shall Intrude invites you to embrace the unparalleled power of a Raid Boss in a unique and immersive gaming experience. Prepare to traverse vibrant realms, engage in intense battles, and conquer all who dare to challenge your dominance. As the embodiment of chaos, your reign will be defined by strategic prowess, unique tile interactions with elemental flavor, boss mechanics you learn as you play.

CHAOS INCARNATE As the unkillable embodiment of chaos, death means nothing to you as your soul is permanently tied to this land of mortals! With each new life, you gain more power, and each cycle opens up new possibilities to grow stronger.

CONQUER THE WORLD Forge your journey by selecting different routes from nodes on the map, ultimately conquering full regions.Along the way, you'll explore a variety of vibrant and imaginative landscapes, each filled with unique obstacles and creatures. Whether it's dense woodlands, majestic snowy mountains, or boundless desert sands. The world of Herelon is full of diverse location for you to explore and conquer!

ELEMENTAL COMBOSNavigate the battlefield using a tile-based system, employing various primordial elements and combine them into potent interactions. Discover all 18 possible tile interactions and tailor your build to your preferred style of play, destroying your enemies with style!

TALENTS Level up your boss to unlock many new cards and relics. Accumulate talent points to invest in a talent tree, which can be customized before each run, enabling you to adapt your boss's play style to suit your preferences.

BOSS MECHANICS As the Chaos Incarnate, you possess 3 Phases. The road to power means unlocking your latent "Boss Mechanics". These mechanics work across distinct phases, with 24 unique powers attainable through in-game achievements. Combine up to 4 "Boss Mechanics" to craft your personalized Raid Boss.

RELICS As you conquer regions or defeat powerful foes, you'll acquire special relics to enhance your elemental tile interactions even more.

WHAT TO EXPECT IN THE FULL VERSION OF THE GAME:

  • Access to the entire map, with many new unique Heroes to beat.

  • Many new cards, talents and boss mechanics for the Dragon Boss.

  • 5 new Difficulties (heroes play 2 cards, random affixes, etc..).

  • Weather effects during combat (sand storm, blizzard,..).

  • New dynamic combat backgrounds with unique combat objectives.

  • Cosmetic Customizable Cave for the Dragon Boss.

  • Mini-game Nodes, Locked special Nodes.

  • Random Merchant events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: None Shall Intrude: Descent is a free Prologue version of None Shall Intrude. A roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Ukrainian
